attributes.action: enhance the pay for those whom are on active service
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: im sure i speak for many when i say our troops do a wondeful job . i feel that our soldiers whom are on active service should receive an icreased active service pay enhancement for all their efforts while on active service thank you

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to enhance the pay for those whom are on active service.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=activespe


Her Majesty's Government
